si.title: හිටපු නාවික හමුදාපතිගේ දිගුව
body_lines: Polgahawela Magistrate Udumbara Dasanayake has ordered the former Navy Commander Nishantha Ulukedenna and former Intelligence Director of the Navy, Rear Admiral (Retired) Sarath Mohoti until the 8th of October.
නාවික හමුදා විමර්ශනයේ අධ්යක්ෂ සමයේදී පොතුහෙරා හි තරුණයෙකු අතුරුදහන් වීම සම්බන්ධයෙන් ජූලි මාසයේදී උල්කූටෙනා ජූලි මාසයේ දී අත්අඩංගුවට ගනු ලැබීය.
අතුරුදන්වීම පිළිබඳ චෝදනා මත මොහෝති අපරාධ විමර්ශන දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව විසින් සැප්තැම්බර් 18 වන දින අත්අඩංගුවට ගනු ලැබීය.

en.title: Extension of the former Navy Commander
body_lines: Polgahawela Magistrate Udumbara Dasanayake has ordered the former Navy Commander Nishantha Ulukedenna and former Intelligence Director of the Navy, Rear Admiral (Retired) Sarath Mohoti until the 8th of October.
In July, Uluketenna was arrested in July for the disappearance of a youth from Pothuhera during his Naval Investigation Director.
Mohoti was arrested by the Criminal Investigation Department on September 18 on charges of disappearance.
